column4: i keep losing all sound when watching videos online at sites like youtube ... does anyone know what might be causing this?
i'd really like to be able to watch videos from youtubes with sound
when you say losing, does it start and then stop or?  never start to being with?

hmmmm  I dunno.  the only thing that has helped me on the no sound on youtube, and type stuff was to install alsaoss.  that seemed to work but I honestly don't really know why that works or anything like that
